item.description:
We are delighted to invite you to the next PIB event with Dr. Mauro Ferrari, Professor and Chairman of the Department of Nano-Medicine and Biomedical Engineering at the University of Texas - Houston, Professor at the M.D. Anderson Cancer Center and at Rice University, as well as President of the "Alliance for NanoHealth". Dr. Ferrari will talk about "Nanomedical Vistas - Technology Applied to Medicine in Today's Future".

When: September 22nd, 6:30pm
Where: MIT Department of Chemical Engineering, Room 66-110, 25 Ames Street, Cambridge, MA 02139

For your free registration please follow this link: http://ferraripib.eventbrite.com
For more info about the event please visit: http://piboston.org/ferrari-nanomedical-vistas-sept-22/

The event is sponsored by: www.ceruleanrx.com
The networking cocktail is kindly offered by Sauces 'n Love: www.saucesnlove.com/
item.name: Nanomedical Vistas - Technology Applied to Medicine in Today's Future
